text: Lotorps IF is a sports club in Lotorp in Sweden. It was established on 15 March 1923. The women's bandy team has played three seasons in the Swedish top division. The women's soccer team played three seasons in the Swedish top division between 1978 and 1997. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Swedish football clubs Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Ski clubs in Sweden Category:1923 establishments in Sweden
title: Lotorps IF
